At various times when you provide us with personal information and/or when you use the Site, you may receive recurring informational or promotional newsletters via email from us (" Email Newsletters ").
When you communicate with us by email, telephone, or through Site, we collect information about your communication and any information you choose to provide.
We may allow third parties to use Cookies to gather information about your use of the Site.

We may also receive information about you from our service providers and business partners, including companies that assist with analytics, data processing and management, customer and technical support, email marketing, hosting, and other services which we use to personalize your experience on the Site.
